TASK: Craft an item of type: red_banner
inventory=[{"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 6, "index": 14}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 14, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 36}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "jack_o_lantern", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a red banner I will need to craft jungle planks. To do so I need to place the jungle wood in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the jungle wood from slot 24 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_banner
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 6, "index": 14}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 14, "index": 23}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 36}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "jack_o_lantern", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]
thought: After crafting the jungle planks, I will need to craft sticks, which require two jungle planks. Therefore, I will move the jungle planks from slot 0 to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_banner
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 6, "index": 14}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 14, "index": 23}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 36}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "jack_o_lantern", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]

thought: The first step in making a red banner is to make sticks. To make sticks we need to place planks in the crafting grid. The jungle planks are at slot 11 so I will move them to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
